snippet.title: Behind The Frame - Official Gameplay Trailer | Day of the Devs 2021
snippet.description:
Behind the Frame is a narrative-driven puzzle game with painting and drawing mechanics, and 360-degree panoramic scenes that look like something out of a Ghibli movie. You play as a painter trying to become a professional artist, solving puzzles in your apartment and connecting with your neighbor in the building next door.

#SummerGameFest #SummerofGaming
